Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the photograph shows astronaut Chris Hadfield holding a bag of marijuana aboard the International Space Station, when in fact the image was manipulated to make it appear that way.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the image is fake and was manipulated.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or credible sources to back up the claim.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the assumption that astronauts have used drugs aboard the International Space Station, which is not supported by any evidence or credible sources.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the alternative explanation that the image was manipulated and does not actually show Chris Hadfield holding a bag of marijuana.
